question.body: Which of the following is the correct order of a signal being passed from a neuron to a muscle?

multiple_choice.choice: Motor end plate, synaptic cleft, axon terminal
Synaptic cleft, motor end plate, axon terminal
Axon terminal, synaptic cleft, motor end plate
None of these is the correct order.

response.feedback: Incorrect. The motor end plate is part of the muscle fiber.
Incorrect. The synaptic cleft is in between the presynaptic membrane and the motor end plate.
Correct. The axon terminal is presynapic, then the synaptic cleft then the motor end plate of the muscle fiber.
Incorrect. One of these choices is the correct order of signaling.
